other_tests.findings: Left ventricular ejection fraction of 25% with left ventricular end-diastolic diameter of 6.3 cm, mild mitral regurgitation, and mild tricuspid regurgitation.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Ejection fraction on echocardiogram 6 months later was unchanged at 25%.

other_tests.findings: Ejection fraction was 15% and left ventricular end-diastolic dimension was 7.5 cm.
Right atrial pressure of 6 mm Hg, pulmonary artery pressure 38/18 mm Hg, and pulmonary capillary wedge pressure of 15 mm Hg, with a cardiac index of 1.9 L/min/m².
Demonstrated a V˙O2max of 10.4 mL/kg/min with a respiratory exchange ratio of 1.1.
